mapper.select: select p.PNAME,p.PCODE, p.PCANCEL, m.ID, m.NICKNAME, c1.name as category, c2.NAME as category2,c3.name as category3, p.PRICE, p.STATUS,p.INPUT_DATE from PRODUCT p, MEMBER m,CATEGORY c1,CATEGORY2 c2,CATEGORY3 c3 where m.id=p.id and p.C3CODE = c3.C3CODE and c1.CCODE =c2.CCODE and c2.C2CODE=c3.C2CODE and p.pcode=#{ pcode }
